<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cavalier's Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6288) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 192 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=244)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6286)

**Requirements**
You are riding your mount.

</column>

---

You [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=2400) to order your mount to [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) twice. At any point during this movement, you can [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) one enemy within reach or within the first range increment of a ranged weapon. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll.
name: Cavalier's Charge
